name: Petsmile Professional Pet Toothpaste for Cats & Dogs - Only VOHC Accepted Toothpaste - Clinically Proven to Control Plaque & Tartar Calprox Formula (Rotisserie Chicken, 4.2 Oz)
short_description: #1 Veterinary Dentist Recommended Pet Toothpaste - Petsmile is the only VOHC recommended toothpaste for your dogs. The VOHC recognizes that Petsmile meets the highest standards for your pet’s oral health. Using Petsmile toothpaste and brushing daily will significantly improve your pet's dental health!

Clinically Proven To Prevent Plaque, Tartar & Gingivitis - Petsmile’s proprietary formula Calprox is clinically proven to inhibit plaque and tartar buildup, while whitening teeth by gently dissolving the protein pellicle. Removing the pellicle leaves your pet’s teeth cleaner and whiter while improving gum health and providing kissable fresh breath!

Pet Safe Human-Grade Ingredients - By using only human-grade ingredients, you can be certain that your pet is using the highest quality pet tooth paste on the market. Your pet can immediately eat or drink after applying Petsmile toothpaste.

Easy No Brush Toothpaste for Cats & Dogs - The no-brushing required formula makes it easy to improve and maintain even the fussiest pet's oral health. Simply apply Petsmile toothpaste on your cat or dog's teeth and let their tongue do the rest. The great flavor will keep your pet looking forward to their next brushing.

Clean USA Sourced Formula - Petsmile toothpaste is hypoallergenic and made from only the highest quality ingredients. Veterinary Dentists choose Petsmile because of the high-quality ingredients that promote healthy white teeth and gums. Disclaimer: The date on the tube represents the manufacturer date. Our toothpaste never expires.

name: Virbac C.E.T.® Oral Hygiene Kit for Dogs | Poultry-flavor Toothpaste | Fingerbrush and Pet Toothbrush
short_description: #1 BRAND CHOSEN BY VETERINARIANS: Proven effective and trusted for over 30 years, C.E.T. is the top recommended dental brand by veterinary professionals to reduce plaque & tartar buildup
Dual-sided toothbrush designed specifically for canine mouths with soft bristles for comfortable brushing
Long handle with reverse angle allows for easy use and soft bristles for comfortable brushing while the finger-brush slips over finger for ease of use and better control
Great tasting poultry-flavored toothpaste is ideal for dogs and cats that quickly build up plaque and tartar
Complete kit with everything pet owners need to start a program of regular oral hygiene for their dog or cat. Ideal to help acquaint dogs/cats and their owners with the tooth brushing experience
product_description: With 25 years of leadership in veterinary home dental care, C.E.T. products are the most tenured veterinary brands in the market today. In addition to pioneering the home dental care market, Virbac has made numerous strategic decisions throughout the years to increase dental education and deliver relevant products to the veterinary community. That’s why the C.E.T. product line is the most recommended dental brand by veterinary professionals. C.E.T. Fingerbrush, an ideal beginner toothbrush to help acquaint dogs and their owners with the tooth brushing experience. Dogs owners should use this packet for the first few days and then progress to using the C.E.T. Dual-Ended Toothbrush. C.E.T. Enzymatic Toothpaste acts quickly to help neutralize mouth odors. The toothpaste is palatable and formulated to be safe even if swallowed by the pet. The C.E.T. Dual-Ended Toothbrush features soft bristles and a long handle with reverse angle heads to enable easy application. Tapered dual ends accommodate large and small tooth surfaces and conform to a pet’s mouth and teeth.

short_description: [ FIGHTS PLAQUE AND REDUCES TARTAR ] Introducing a new scientifically formulated toothpaste for dogs and cats with coactiv+ technology from bluestem. coactiv+ is a new formulation of food-grade ingredients. Our toothpaste fights plaque and reduces tartar which improves oral hygiene and freshens breath. This product has also been tested in vitro for it’s effectiveness. *Study available upon request.

[ TESTED FOR EFFICACY ] Based on in vitro testing against 7 different pet oral bacteria and in comparison to 4 competitor toothpastes*, bluestem toothpaste was found to be very effective. Study available upon request.

[ A TRUSTED COMPANY ] As fellow pet owner's and lovers we understand the importance of safe products for our furry little friends, that's why our products are made and tested in our laboratories here in North America. Our mission is to make sure we are looking out for your pets’ long term health.

[ SAFE FOR DOGS AND CATS ] - We've gone the extra mile to ensure that our pet toothpaste and toothbrush are safe for your pet. Our food-grade ingredients are alcohol-free, xylitol-free, and sugar-free. Dogs will like the chicken flavored toothpaste and humans will like their pets healthy mouth and fresh breath. IT'S A WIN - WIN. For optimal results, use in combination with bluestem water additive and bluestem oral spray.
product_description: Keep your pet’s mouth clean and healthy with Bluestem™ Toothpaste with Coactiv+. Specially formulated for both dogs and cats, this easy-to-use toothpaste helps reduce plaque and tartar buildup while freshening breath and promoting overall oral health. Its thick, sticky texture helps it stay on the toothbrush longer for a more effective clean, and it can even be used as a tooth gel after brushing for extra protection. Safe for daily use, it’s the perfect way to maintain your pet’s dental hygiene routine.

short_description: DID YOU KNOW AROUND 80% OF DOGS OVER 3 HAVE DENTAL DISEASE? Dental disease causes pain and discomfort daily, but pets are pros at hiding it. Regular teeth cleaning for dogs by brushing your dog's teeth reduces plaque and tartar that cause dental disease
COMPLETE DENTAL KIT - Includes a 2.5oz chicken flavor toothpaste, a small toothbrush, and a microfiber brush for convenient training and sensitivity protection

product_description: Unleash the power of baking soda with Arm and Hammer pet dental products. Arm and Hammer for Dogs products leverage the power of baking soda to clean gently and deodorize naturally. Arm & Hammer Complete Care Enzymatic Puppy Dental Kit offers an advanced formula, enriched with baking soda and calcium plus calcium, The enzymatic puppy toothpaste included in this kit offers a complete care solution that is fluoride-free and nontoxic, ensuring a gentle yet effective clean for your pet's teeth. This tartar control formula helps reduce plaque buildup and maintain your dog's oral health when used regularly. The kit includes a 2.5oz chicken flavor toothpaste, a small toothbrush, and a microfiber brush for convenient training and sensitivity protection Our toothpaste for dogs is crafted with a delicious peanut butter flavor that dogs love, making it easier than ever to incorporate into your pet's daily routine. Plus, baking soda particles dissolve into hard-to-reach areas for lasting deodorizing and cleaning. With added calcium, this toothpaste for dogs is part of a complete dental care system. This product is cruelty-free and non-toxic, formulated without the use of any dyes. Trust the power of Arm & Hammer pet dental products for healthy pets and fresh kisses!

Directions For first time brushers, put a small amount of toothpaste on your finger and invite the dog to lick it off. Slowly progress to lifting your dog's lips and rubbing the toothpaste on your finger aling the gum line and teeth. When your pet is comfortable, put a small amount of toothpaste on a toothbrush or finger brush and repeat the above steps. Always make brushing a positive experience for your dog. For best results, brush daily.

TACKLES BAD BREATH AT THE SOURCE - Unlike other pet toothpastes that only mask odors, our enzyme dog toothpaste targets bad breath at its origin. It removes food debris & tartar, helping to combat the real causes of gum and periodontal issues.
